titles.title: A bill to continue until the close of September 30, 1990, the existing suspension of duties on color couplers and coupler intermediates used in the manufacture of photographic sensitized material.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, USDA, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend, through September 30, 1990, the suspension of duty on photographic color couplers and certain cyclic organic chemical products used in the manufacture of photographic color couplers.
